metadata.title: CVE-2024-50306 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Unchecked return value can allow Apache Traffic Server to retain privilegeson startup.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: from 9.2.0 through 9.2.5, from10.0.0 through 10.0.1.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 9.2.6 or 10.0.2, which fixesthe issue.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
